extendedInfo.description: Get a good idea of the mobile signal strength with either:-1. A simple 1X1 Widget without taking too much space2. A convenient Status bar notification3. A detailed network information Screen.IMPORTANT: Samsung users - Read the notesThe App gives a wealth of information on the network, can be extensively customized to suite any theme and there are also notifications for out of service and roaming conditions.Free Features:-1. Network Signal strength in dBm.2. Themes with extensive customization3. Out of service and roaming notifications.4. Realtime/Battery Saving Mode.5. LTE/EVDO Mode for data signal strength.6. Detailed Network Info - Access point, Network type(EDGE, GPRS, EVDO, 3G, 4G, LTE, HSDP, IDEN, CDMA, HSUPA, 1xRTT, UMTS, HSPA+),Operator, Phone type, Data network, IP Address, downloaded, uploaded, IMEI/MEID/ESN, Manufacturer, Model, Branding, MCC, MNC, CID, BER, LAC, Ec/Io, SNR, RSRP, RSRQ, CQI.Pro Features:-1. Additional Measurement Units - Percentage and ASU2. Restart Mobile Connection only without disturbing WiFi, NFC etc(Not available for >= Android 4.2)3. Airplane cellphone radio only without disturbing WiFi, NFC etc(Not available for >= Android 4.2)4. Four Widget Styles5. Signal Strength in Status Bar in percentage6. Hexcodes for precise color themingNotes:- 1. Signal Refresh.   Some Samsung ROMs are not supporting signal strength refresh. If the Network Type and the Carrier are updating correctly but the signal strength is not updating then this is a sure sign of a broken ROM. This is a known issue and not a problem with the App. 2. If you cant find the widget in the list of widgets after installation change the orientation of device with the list of widgets opened. This will cause the list of widgets to get refreshed.3.Permissions - The app requires requisite permissions for accessing the info shown in the Network Info screen and showing the Google ads.4.The Pro and Free apps are seperate apps and billed seperately by Google.Please give feedback by email also to lakshman5876@gmail.com

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: App works wonderfully and gives me exactly the info I needed.
reviews.author: Scott Techau

reviews.title: Great little app
reviews.comment: especially when the status bar is hidden. Happy to unlock.
reviews.author: John Slater

reviews.title: Signal depends on weather :(
reviews.comment: That and needs latest Jellybean upgrade! cute Widget though!
reviews.author: Grace Messenger

reviews.title: Lousy application
reviews.comment: Uninstalled it
reviews.author: Razmin Musa

reviews.title: No graphs
reviews.comment: No graphical display
reviews.author: Earl Novendstern

reviews.title: Samsung galaxy s3
reviews.comment: This app is totally crap! ! I still don\'t have signal at all, no bars nothing.. am removing
reviews.author: Stacey Philp

reviews.title: Great features
reviews.comment: Verified working with the Samsung S4 Mini (GT-I9195).  Widget and app provides plenty of usefull information. Most important feature for me is the info on current cell provider in the widget - need it when traveling to asure I am on the cell network with best roaming rates.  Would be 5-stars with more customization options to the Notification feature for the status bar.
reviews.author: H\303\245kan \303\226sterhed

reviews.title: Like the app, but some billing issues.
reviews.comment: Correction to my previous review. This is a very nice and usefull app. Although I had some billing issues when I switched from an old phone and old version of the app to newones. When I contacted the  the developer he addressed my concern and posted a refound for the second purchase.  I still had issues with the app, but after unistalling it completely and getting my new paid version 6 it works just fine. Thank you
reviews.author: Peter Rutkowski

reviews.title: Was awesome, but...
reviews.comment: Seems to lock up and not update properly since the last update.  Has been a freaking horse on my EVO4G and SGS3 for years, please fix!
reviews.author: Jerry Gardner, Jr.

reviews.title: Great techie stuff inside.
reviews.comment: Would love to see cell sites on map.

reviews.title: Great but missing one key feature
reviews.comment: This app is great but its missing one key feature. Please allow us to choose which app should launch when pressing on the widget or turn on/turn off the data. Preferably both options.

reviews.title: Horrible
reviews.comment: Useless doesn\'t give the right readings at all.

reviews.title: Signal bars not working
reviews.comment: The minimalist pro style graph bars never change with the signal. Please fix for 5 stars!

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Finally one that works!

reviews.title: Bad resize
reviews.comment: I could before resize the widget and it looked good. I use custom grid with more rows etc with nova launcher. Now the widget look ugly and dont fit.

reviews.title: EVO 4G LTE
reviews.comment: Still works great after new update. You must uncheck Lte when not on Lte to get signal strength for eHRPD

reviews.title: Bad update
reviews.comment: After a recent update it won\'t scale right and doesn\'t look right. Uninstalling

reviews.title: Excellent data, so so widget after updates
reviews.comment: Excellent underlying data. Many options. LTE added too. Latest widgets disappointing. Living with old version.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Mar 18th Update
reviews.comment: Has completely stopped updating...Shows 0% in notification always...-125 dbm in widget always...Loved this app until the last 2 updates...What Happened???  I have the Pro version fyi...  Update:  Unchecked LTE Data and it works flawlessly again...
reviews.author: A Google User
